translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I pass into the hands of Your Lordship Gomes Porto, Justice of the Peace of Santa Maria, the included ordinance. By Your Lordship’s official letter

The ordinance and the same official letter conclusively show who the influential persons are, and almost all have been pardoned by the government. To the Most Excellent Bento Manuel and to Your Lordship

Since they fall into the power of Your Lordship Gomes Porto in the attached official letter, Your Lordship on the 5th of February of the current year, because almost all have been prisoners and pardoned, and are found under the circumstances marked by the same decree.

God keep Your Lordship Secretary of War Affairs in Caçapava, 19th of December, 1839. Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Answered on the 22nd of the current month.
